Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • Item

  • public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Item - an item in a text-based game. This class is part of the "Mansion Detective" application. "Mansion Detective" is a text based murder mystery adventure game. An "Item" represents an object a person can interact with. It has a weight and can be locked. An item can also have items inside of it.
    Version:
    (a version number or a date)
    Author:
    (your name)

      • Item

        public Item(java.lang.String name,
            int weight,
            boolean found)
        Create an item named "name". Initially it has a weight and is either out in the open or hidden.

        public boolean hasItems()

        Returns:
        true if yes, else false.

      • isFound
